software_list.name: IINA
software_list.description: 面向 macOS 的现代化视频播放器
software_list.description_en: A modern video player for macOS
highlights: 基于 mpv 内核，播放性能出色
原生 macOS 设计，符合系统交互习惯
highlights_en: Excellent playback performance based on mpv
Native macOS design with system-standard interaction

software_list.name: Popcorn-Time
software_list.description: 观看电影、电视剧等，汇聚海量内容
software_list.description_en: Watch movies and TV shows with a vast content library

software_list.name: mpv
software_list.description: 自由、开源、跨平台的高性能命令行媒体播放器，支持几乎所有常见媒体格式和字幕类型，拥有高级视频输出与强大脚本扩展。
software_list.description_en: A free, open-source, cross-platform command-line media player. Supports most common media formats and subtitles, offers advanced video output and powerful scripting extensibility.
highlights: 免费开源，内核纯净、性能极致
几乎支持全部主流视频、音频与字幕格式
高级 OpenGL/Vulkan/D3D11 视频渲染，支持色彩管理/HDR/插帧/高质量缩放等
支持硬件解码、极低延迟、极佳画面
超强脚本能力和 C API 可嵌入其它应用
小巧精悍，跨三大桌面平台
highlights_en: Free and open source, lightweight and performant
Supports virtually all common video, audio, and subtitle formats
High quality OpenGL/Vulkan/D3D11 video rendering (color management, HDR, frame interpolation, scaling)
Hardware decoding support, low latency, excellent picture quality
Powerful scripting and embeddable C API

software_list.name: LocalSend
software_list.description: 局域网内快速分享文件的跨平台工具
software_list.description_en: Cross-platform tool for quick file sharing within local network
highlights: 去中心化，本地直连传输
真正跨平台，覆盖桌面与移动设备
局域网传输，无需外部服务器
highlights_en: Truly cross-platform covering desktop and mobile
Local network transfer, no external servers

software_list.name: Motrix
software_list.description: 开源下载管理器，支持 HTTP、BT、磁力链接等多协议下载
software_list.description_en: Open source download manager supporting HTTP, BT, magnet links and more protocols
highlights: 支持多协议下载：HTTP、HTTPS、FTP、BT、磁力链接
界面友好，支持拖拽和批量下载
highlights_en: Multi-protocol support: HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, BT, magnet links
User-friendly interface with drag-and-drop and batch downloads

software_list.name: Keka
software_list.description: 文件压缩与解压缩工具
software_list.description_en: File compression and decompression tool
highlights: 注重隐私与本地数据安全
专注压缩本身，不引入多余功能

software_list.name: Transnomino
software_list.description: Mac 批量重命名工具
software_list.description_en: Batch file rename tool for Mac
highlights: 基于文件属性的文本插入
highlights_en: Text insertion based on file attributes

software_list.name: Sublime-Text
software_list.description: 文本编辑器，支持代码高亮、智能补全
software_list.description_en: Text editor with syntax highlighting and smart auto-completion
highlights: 支持 Apple Silicon 与 Linux ARM64
智能上下文感知自动补全
highlights_en: Apple Silicon and Linux ARM64 support

software_list.name: iTerm2
software_list.description: macOS 终端工具，支持多标签、多窗格
software_list.description_en: macOS terminal with multi-tab and split pane support

software_list.name: Alfred
software_list.description: macOS 效率神器，搜索、快捷键、文本扩展
software_list.description_en: macOS productivity app for search, shortcuts, and text expansion
highlights: 高度可自定义，提高效率

software_list.name: Utools
software_list.description: AI 助力超级助手，插件化工具平台
software_list.description_en: AI-powered universal tool platform with plugins
highlights: 海量插件应用，持续进化

software_list.name: RustDesk
software_list.description: 开源远程桌面软件，支持自建服务器，隐私保护
software_list.description_en: Open source remote desktop software with self-hosted server, privacy-focused
highlights: 自建服务器，无需第三方
highlights_en: No configuration required, works out of box

software_list.name: OBS
software_list.description: 免费开源的视频录制和直播软件
software_list.description_en: Free open source video recording and streaming software
highlights: 高性能实时视频/音频捕获和混合
功能强大且易于使用的配置选项
highlights_en: High-performance real-time video/audio capture and mixing

software_list.name: QuickRecorder
software_list.description: 轻量化高性能 macOS 屏幕录制工具
software_list.description_en: Lightweight high-performance macOS screen recorder
highlights: 支持录制屏幕、窗口、应用和移动设备
无驱动音频回录、鼠标高亮、屏幕放大镜
完整支持 macOS 14 "演讲者前置"
支持 HEVC with Alpha 视频格式
highlights_en: Screen, window, app and mobile device recording
Audio capture, mouse highlight, screen magnifier
HEVC with Alpha video format support

software_list.name: Audacity
software_list.description: 免费开源的音频编辑器，支持录音、编辑和混音
software_list.description_en: Free, open source, cross-platform audio editor for recording and editing
highlights: 支持多种音频格式导入导出
丰富的效果和插件支持
频谱分析和音频可视化

software_list.name: Modern-CSV
software_list.description: 直观的 CSV 编辑器/查看器
software_list.description_en: Intuitive CSV editor and viewer
highlights: 轻松编辑 CSV 文件
查找和排列 CSV 数据
快速查看大型 CSV 文件
完全可定制的 CSV 编辑器
highlights_en: Fast viewing of large CSV files

software_list.name: Typora
software_list.description: 简洁的 Markdown 编辑器和阅读器
software_list.description_en: Clean Markdown editor and reader with live preview
highlights: 可读可写，支持实时预览
highlights_en: Read and write with live preview

software_list.name: Joplin
software_list.description: 开源笔记应用，支持 Markdown，跨平台同步，隐私聚焦
software_list.description_en: Open source note-taking app with Markdown support, cross-platform sync, privacy-focused
highlights: 支持多媒体笔记、数学表达式和图表
跨平台同步，支持 E2EE 加密
Web Clipper 扩展，保存网页为笔记
highlights_en: Multimedia notes, math expressions, and diagrams
Web clipper extension for saving web pages

software_list.name: Logseq
software_list.description: 隐私优先的开源知识库，支持 Markdown 和双向链接
software_list.description_en: Privacy-first, open-source knowledge base with Markdown and bi-directional links
highlights: 支持 Markdown 和双向链接
强大的查询和搜索功能
插件扩展和主题自定义
跨平台支持，包括 Web 版本

software_list.name: MarkText
software_list.description: 简单优雅的开源 Markdown 编辑器，支持实时预览
software_list.description_en: Simple and elegant open-source Markdown editor with real-time preview
highlights: 数学表达式、front matter 和表情符号
输出 HTML 和 PDF 文件
粘贴图片直接从剪贴板
highlights_en: Math expressions, front matter and emojis

software_list.name: Ice
software_list.description: macOS 菜单栏管理工具
software_list.description_en: macOS menu bar management tool
highlights: 在菜单栏下方显示隐藏的菜单栏项
拖放界面排列菜单栏项
highlights_en: Show hidden menu bar items below the bar

software_list.name: Stats
software_list.description: 菜单栏中的 macOS 系统监视器
software_list.description_en: macOS system monitor in menu bar

software_list.name: DynamicLake-Pro
software_list.description: macOS 刘海美化与功能增强工具
software_list.description_en: macOS notch beautification and enhancement tool
highlights: miniLake「迷你湖」，以紧凑形式展示关键信息
通过细节级改动，显著提升整体使用体验
highlights_en: Significant UX improvement through detailed changes

software_list.name: ImageOptim
software_list.description: 图片无损压缩工具
software_list.description_en: Lossless image compression tool

software_list.name: Snippai
software_list.description: AI 加持的智能截图工具
software_list.description_en: AI-powered smart screenshot tool

software_list.name: Chrome
software_list.description: Google 浏览器，专为您而打造
software_list.description_en: Google Chrome - The browser built for you
highlights: 随心定制，个性体验随时享
确保您能安全浏览网页
线上处理事务的快捷方式
highlights_en: Fast way to get things done online

software_list.name: BongoCat
software_list.description: 跨平台桌宠，为桌面增添乐趣
software_list.description_en: Cross-platform desktop pet for fun
highlights: 根据键盘或鼠标操作同步移动
完全开源，绝不收集用户数据
highlights_en: Completely open source, no data collection

software_list.name: RunCat365
software_list.description: Windows 任务栏上的跑步猫动画，显示 CPU 使用率
software_list.description_en: Running cat animation on Windows taskbar showing CPU usage
highlights: 直观显示 CPU 使用率

software_list.name: File-Converter
software_list.description: 简单易用的文件转换和压缩工具，通过 Windows 资源管理器右键菜单使用
software_list.description_en: Simple file converter and compressor, accessible via Windows Explorer context menu
highlights: 简单易用，只需点击两下
开源免费，无广告，不收集数据
支持多种文件格式转换
支持视频、音频、图片、文档转换
highlights_en: Simple and easy to use, just two clicks
Open source, free, no ads, no data collection
Video, audio, image, and document conversion

software_list.name: Better Shot
software_list.description: macOS 免费开源截图工具，集捕获、编辑、标注、OCR 与快速导出于一体，注重隐私与性能
software_list.description_en: Free and open-source macOS screenshot tool. Capture, edit, annotate, OCR, and export fast with privacy-first, native performance.
highlights: 区域/窗口/全屏三种捕获模式，支持全局快捷键
内置强大编辑器：背景、渐变、模糊、阴影、圆角
标注工具：形状、箭头、文本、编号标签
离线 OCR 文本识别
隐私优先：全部本地处理，不上传不收集数据
原生性能：Rust + Tauri，资源占用低
快速导出到目录或剪贴板
highlights_en: Powerful editor: backgrounds, gradients, blur, shadows, border radius
Annotation tools: shapes, arrows, text, numbered labels
Offline OCR with bundled Tesseract.js language data
Privacy-first: all local, no uploads, no data collection
Native performance: Rust + Tauri, minimal resource usage
Fast export to directory or clipboard

software_list.name: ShareX
software_list.description: 一款免费开源的屏幕截图和文件分享工具
software_list.description_en: ShareX is a free and open-source screen capture and file sharing tool
highlights: 文件上传到多个目的地

software_list.name: FlameShot
software_list.description: 强大而简单的开源截图软件
software_list.description_en: Powerful yet simple to use screenshot software

software_list.name: Calibre
software_list.description: 一款强大的电子书管理和转换工具
software_list.description_en: The official source code repository for the calibre ebook manager

software_list.name: Ulauncher
software_list.description: 功能丰富的 Linux 应用程序启动器
software_list.description_en: Feature rich application Launcher for Linux

software_list.name: KOReader
software_list.description: 开源电子书阅读器，支持多种格式，专注阅读体验
software_list.description_en: An open source ebook reader with support for many formats, focused on reading experience

software_list.name: Neovim
software_list.description: 超可扩展的基于Vim的文本编辑器
software_list.description_en: hyperextensible Vim-based text editor

software_list.name: CodeEdit
software_list.description: 原生macOS代码编辑器，轻量级、高性能、开源免费
software_list.description_en: A native code editor for macOS, lightweight, high-performance, open source and free

software_list.name: Zettlr
software_list.description: 专为学术写作设计的免费开源Markdown编辑器
software_list.description_en: A free and open-source Markdown editor designed for academic writing

software_list.name: Marp
software_list.description: 使用Markdown创建美丽幻灯片演示的生态系统
software_list.description_en: Markdown Presentation Ecosystem for creating beautiful slide decks

software_list.name: Darktable
software_list.description: 开源摄影工作流应用程序和RAW开发者，虚拟灯箱和暗房
software_list.description_en: Open source photography workflow application and raw developer, virtual lighttable and darkroom

software_list.name: Cherry Studio
software_list.description: 支持多模型的AI桌面客户端，集成300+AI助手，支持自主编码和智能自动化
software_list.description_en: AI desktop client supporting multiple models, with 300+ AI assistants, autonomous coding, and intelligent automation

software_list.name: Chatbox
software_list.description: 强大的AI客户端，支持多种AI模型和API，兼容众多前沿AI模型
software_list.description_en: Powerful AI client compatible with many cutting-edge AI models and APIs

software_list.name: Karing
software_list.description: 简单强大的代理工具，支持Clash/Sing-box路由规则
software_list.description_en: Simple & Powerful proxy utility, Support routing rules for clash/sing-box

software_list.name: Clash Verge Rev
software_list.description: 基于Tauri的现代GUI客户端，为Windows、macOS和Linux提供定制代理体验
software_list.description_en: A modern GUI client based on Tauri, designed to run in Windows, macOS and Linux for tailored proxy experience
